summary: Ever hated that one Jarl or Wanted to feel like a boss killing one? Well now you can in Unessential Jarls.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Ever hated that one Jarl or Wanted to feel like a boss killing one? Well now you can in Unessential Jarls.

[color=#ff0000][size=4](Warning this mod will break the story if you kill one of them)[/size][/color]
[size=4]Recommendations:[/size]
[size=3]Resurrect the jarls if you wanna continue the quests!

[/size][/b][b][size=3][size=3][b]     Jarls Affected: [/b][/size][/size][/b][b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Skald[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Siddgeir[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Igmund[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Idgrod Ravencrone[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Laila Law-Giver[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Balgruuf The Greater[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Ulfric Stormcloak[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Korir[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Brina Merilis[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Dengeir of Stuhn[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Thongvor Silver-Blood[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Sorli Black Briar[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Maven Black-Briar[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Brunwulf Free-Winter[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Kraldar[b][size=3]
[/size][/b]Vignar Gray-mane[b][size=3]
[/size]Elisif The fair[size=3]
[/size]
Stewards Affected:
[/b][size=1]Jorleif
[color=#ff0000]Nenya[/color]
[color=#1e84cc]Tekla[/color]
Falk Firebeard

Anuriel[/color]
